titleStmt.title: A relation of the cruelties and barbarous murthers, and other misdemeanours, done and committed by some foot-souldiers, and others, without command, upon some of the inhabitants of Enfield, Edmonton, Southmyms, and Hadley, in the county of Middlesex, and their servants and cattle.

A relation of the cruelties and barbarous murthers, and other misdemeanours, done and committed by some foot-souldiers, and others, without command, upon some of the inhabitants of Enfield, Edmonton, Southmyms, and Hadley, in the county of Middlesex, and their servants and cattle.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
